TextView.android:text: Apartment, suite, unit, building, floor, etc.
Try out a new feature from Chrome
Save bandwidth and browse more securely
Chrome optimizes the way pages you visit are sent and received, so you can browse more using less data.
"Using Chrome's Safe Browsing technology, you will see a warning message before you visit a site that is suspected of phishing or containing malware."

CheckBox.android:text: Help make Google Chrome better by automatically sending usage statistics and crash reports to Google!
Help make Google Chrome better by automatically sending usage statistics and crash reports to Google!
Prevent this page from creating additional dialogs

TextView.android:text: Drag the slider until you can read this comfortably. Text should look at least this big after double-tapping on a paragraph.
Only someone with your passphrase can read your encrypted data. This passphrase is not sent to or stored by Google. If you forget your passphrase, you will need to reset sync.

PreferenceScreen.android:title: Legal information
PreferenceScreen.android:summary: Copyright 2006-2013 Google Inc. All Rights Reserved.

com.google.android.apps.chrome.preferenc.android:title: Force enable zoom
com.google.android.apps.chrome.preferenc.android:summary: "Override a website's request to prevent zooming in"

com.google.android.apps.chrome.preferenc.android:title: When this feature is turned on, Chrome will use Google servers to compress pages you visit before downloading them. SSL and Incognito pages will not be included.
"Chrome's Safe Browsing system will also be used to detect malicious pages and protect you from phishing, malware, and harmful downloads."
Accept cookies
com.google.android.apps.chrome.preferenc.android:summary: Allow sites to save and read cookie data

com.google.android.apps.chrome.preferenc.android:title: Enable location
com.google.android.apps.chrome.preferenc.android:summary: Allow sites to request access to your location

com.google.android.apps.chrome.preferenc.android:title: Voice and Video calling
com.google.android.apps.chrome.preferenc.android:summary: Allow sites to access microphone and camera

PreferenceScreen.android:summary: Allow sites to request access to your location

com.google.android.apps.chrome.preferenc.android:title:
"Enabling 'Do Not Track' means that a request will be included with your browsing traffic. Any effect depends on whether a website responds to the request, and how the request is interpreted.
For example, some websites may respond to this request by showing you ads that aren't based on other websites you've visited. Many websites will still collect and use your browsing data - for example to improve security, to provide content, ads and recommendations on their websites, and to generate reporting statistics."
Navigation error suggestions
com.google.android.apps.chrome.preferenc.android:summary: Show suggestions for alternatives when a web address does not resolve or a connection cannot be made

com.google.android.apps.chrome.preferenc.android:title: Search and URL suggestions
com.google.android.apps.chrome.preferenc.android:summary: Use a prediction service to show related queries and popular websites as you type in the address bar

com.google.android.apps.chrome.preferenc.android:title:
"When protected content is ON, websites will be able to authenticate your device to ensure it is authorized to play premium, protected videos.
If OFF, you may not be able to play premium videos on this device."
Clear stored data
com.google.android.apps.chrome.preferenc.android:dialogMessage: All data stored by this website will be deleted

com.google.android.apps.chrome.preferenc.android:title: Location access
com.google.android.apps.chrome.preferenc.android:summaryOn: This site can access your location

com.google.android.apps.chrome.preferenc.android:title: Allow device credential access for premium content playback
com.google.android.apps.chrome.preferenc.android:summaryOn: This site can access device credential for premium content playback
com.google.android.apps.chrome.preferenc.android:summaryOff: This site cannot access device credential for premium content playback

com.google.android.apps.chrome.preferenc.android:title: When this feature is turned on, Chrome will offer to translate pages written in other languages using Google Translate.

item.android:title: Open original image in new tab
